node.title: US Governor spares convicted killer's life hours before execution
node.alt: A man with dark hair and slight facial hair standing against a wall with blank facial expression
node.description: Julius Jones, the focus of a documentary questioning his guilt in the murder of a US businessman, has been granted clemency hours before his scheduled execution, prompting relief from supporters and celebrities.
node.content:
["Oklahoma's Governor has spared the life of convicted murderer Julius Jones\u00a0just hours before his scheduled execution.", "Jones's\u00a0case has\u00a0drawn widespread demonstrations amid doubts about his guilt in the killing of a businessman more than 20 years ago.", "Governor Kevin Stitt commuted the 41-year-old's death sentence to life imprisonment before his scheduled execution at 4pm Thursday (local time).", "\"After prayerful consideration and reviewing materials presented by all sides of this case, I have determined to commute Julius Jones' sentence to life imprisonment without the possibility of parole,\" he said.\u00a0", "Amanda Bass, a lawyer representing Jones, said she hoped Mr Stitt would have granted\u00a0Jones a chance at parole, but was grateful he would not\u00a0be executed.", "\"Governor Stitt took an important step today towards restoring public faith in the criminal justice system by ensuring that Oklahoma does not execute an innocent man,\" she said.", "The case has\u00a0attracted attention from celebrities such as reality TV star Kim Kardashian.", "She said she spoke on the phone with Jones\u00a0between his visits with lawyers and his family.", "She thanked Mr Stitt and the parole board for their decision.\u00a0", "
Documentary sparks interest in case
", "Jones was convicted of first-degree murder and sentenced to death\u00a0for the 1999 shooting death of Paul Howell, a businessman from the Oklahoma City suburb of Edmond, during a carjacking.", "The profile of Jones's case grew significantly after it was featured in The Last Defense,\u00a0a three-episode documentary produced by actress Viola Davis that aired in 2018.", "Jones alleges he was framed by the actual killer, a high-school friend and former co-defendant who was a key witness against him.", "But Oklahoma County District Attorney David Prater and the state's former attorney-general, Mike Hunter, said the evidence against Jones was\u00a0overwhelming.", "More than 100 supporters gathered outside the prison housing Jones applauded\u00a0and cheered\u00a0when the decision about his clemency was announced.\u00a0", "Reverend Keith Jossell, Jones's spiritual adviser, said the decision recognised the many people who supported his\u00a0plight.\u00a0", "", "
Supporters of Julius Jones rallied outside Oklahoma State Penitentiary before his scheduled execution.\u00a0(AP: Reese Gorman/The Norman Transcript\u00a0)
", "
Parole board votes to commute sentence\u00a0
", "Earlier, Jones's lawyers filed a last-minute emergency request\u00a0seeking a temporary stop to his execution, saying Oklahoma's lethal injection procedures posed a \"serious and substantial risk of severe suffering and pain to prisoners\".", "The lawyers cited an October execution in which John Marion Grant convulsed and vomited as he was being put to death.", "Oklahoma ended a six-year moratorium on executions \u2014 brought on by concerns over its lethal injection methods \u2014 last month.", "In\u00a0separate death row case this week, the state's Pardon and Parole Board voted 3-2 to grant clemency, citing lethal injection protocols.", "Earlier this month, that same board also recommended in a 3-1 vote that Mr Stitt commute Jones's sentence to life in prison with the possibility of parole.", "Several members of the panel said they doubted the evidence that led to Jones's conviction.", "
'He is so grateful'
", "Reverend\u00a0Jossell said Jones was overwhelmed by the support.", "\"Julius has always been so amazed by the \u2026 many people God has brought together, Republicans and Democrats, black, white, gay, straight, native,\" he said.", "\"He is so grateful that all of these people have come together.\"", "Oklahoma City resident\u00a0Devona Willis\u00a0described the announcement as \"a celebration\".", "\"It's kind of like somebody gave you a million dollars. You're not just going to say 'yay!' and be done with it,\" she said.", "
Attorney-General remains convinced Jones was killer\u00a0
", "Oklahoma Attorney-General John O'Connor said he respected Mr Stitt's decision to commute the sentence but he remained convinced of Jones's guilt.", "Information from trial transcripts shows witnesses identified Jones as the shooter and placed him with Mr Howell's stolen vehicle.", "Investigators also found the murder weapon wrapped in a bandana with Jones's DNA in an attic space above his bedroom.", "Jones said in his commutation filing the gun and bandana were planted by the true killer, who was inside his\u00a0house after the shooting.", "Mr Howell's sister, Megan Tobey, and two young daughters were in Mr Howell's SUV when the carjacking happened in his parents' driveway.", "Ms Tobey testified before the board that she distinctly saw Jones shoot her brother.", "AP"]
